INSERT INTO PROD_CRAFWORK_PARAM_PLM ( ID, PROD_NO, MID_PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, PARAM_NAME, VALUES1, VALUES2, VALUES3, MODIFY_TIME, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, DELETED, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{values1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{values2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{values3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_CRAFWORK_PARAM_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_CRAFWORK_PARAM_PLM
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PARAM_NAME = #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

VALUES2 = #{values2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
